Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav (68* off 26 balls) is the Player of the Match
Hong Kong lost their 5th wicket and the game was already done and dusted by then
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav shares that some of his shots are predetermined but most of the time, you have to bat in the present
Suryakumar Yadav adds that you have to be flexible and ready to play at any position, and he has been doing it for some time now
Miscellaneous Highlights: India dominated at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
Babar Hayat laid down the platform for Hong Kong
Ravindra Jadeja claimed wickets for India
Others: The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
Hong Kong started well with the bat but lost their top three quickly
Scott McKechnie and Zeeshan Ali got away with a few boundaries towards the end
